price_limit.common: only update price feed when the change rate is between 5% ~ 100%
price_limit.common1: set the frequency, how many seconds need to wait until next fetch
price_limit.common2: update the feed price at least 23.5 hours a time
price_limit.common3: we use the median price, how many samples need to use

market_weight.common1: include depth between price*(1-depth_change) and price*(1+depth_change)
